# ESLint Rules

> Project-specific [ESLint runtime rules][eslint-rules].

<section class="intro">

</section>

<!-- /.intro -->

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var rules = require( '@stdlib/_tools/eslint/rules' );
```

#### rules

Project-specific [ESLint runtime rules][eslint-rules].

```javascript
console.dir( rules );
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<section class="examples">

## Examples

```javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var rules = require( '@stdlib/_tools/eslint/rules' );

console.log( getKeys( rules ) );
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->
